misc: Has been working on his mental game a lot
biography: Eero, the younger brother of the esteemed Pasi, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Vuosaari Golf Helsinki with distinction. Known for his thoughtful demeanor and meticulous approach to the game, Eero has captured the hearts of spectators with his unwavering determination.

With seven past appearances, Eero is a mainstay in the tournament. Although the coveted Hector Trophée has eluded him thus far, his dedication bore fruit when he clinched the Victor Trophy, a testament to his individual prowess. This year marks Eero's eighth venture into the competition.

In anticipation of the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, Eero has been diligently honing his mental fortitude, seeking to elevate his performance to new heights. His commitment to self-improvement and strategic gameplay makes him a formidable contender, and someone to watch in the upcoming tournament.
